Attributes.description: The logic, challenges, and major strategies of empirical political research. Core research tasks including: asking answerable questions, defining concepts, formulating hypotheses, gathering evidence, measuring variables, constructing comparisons, drawing causal inferences, and reporting findings.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Fri, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 10:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: D209
